scripts.build: npm run build:lambda:cjs && npm run build:lambda:esm
scripts.package: npm run package:lambda:cjs && npm run package:lambda:esm
scripts.build:lambda:esm: rimraf dist && tsc -p -p tsconfig.lambda-esm.json && echo {"type":"module"} > dist/package.json
scripts.package:lambda:cjs: npm run build:lambda:cjs && node zip-lambda.js lambda-cjs.zip
scripts.package:lambda:esm: npm run build:lambda:cjs && node zip-lambda.js lambda-esm.zip
